G.T. - 2318WAR CABINET.OIL FUEL SITUATION.Copy of letter dated l6th October,1917 from the ffoarth Sea Lord to the Secretary, War Cabinet."Bear Sir Maurice Hankey,With reference to your letter dated 2nd July, the particulars to date as regards oil fuel stocks are asfollows(a) Stock of oil fuel in theUnited Kingdom this morning(b) On the way from loadingPorts.(c) quantities for which it isanticipated shipping will be available during the ensuing four weeks.Tons. 749,000300,000460,000Yours very truly,(Signed) HUGH TOTHILL.
